last_episode_to_air.name: Letting Go
last_episode_to_air.overview: Jeff's last, painful lesson for the bears is teaching them how to be afraid of humans, but he still wonders if they'll be able to survive in the in wild without him.

name: Project Grizzly
overview: A six-part docu-series which follows bear trainer Jeff Watson and his two rescued bears, Bob and Screech, as Watson attempts to return them to the wild where they belong. A crisis of conscience has spurred him to do the unprecedented - introduce his two 700-pound grizzlies, animals that were raised as his kin, to the wild. Jeff must teach the bears every skill they don't currently possess in order to survive the deep wild.

episodes.name: Into the Wild
episodes.overview: Renowned bear handler Jeff Watson says goodbye to his family and friends and sets out on an adventure into the wilderness of Southern Indiana to teach his two 700 lb. grizzly bears Bob and Screech how to survive on their own in the wild.

episodes.name: To Teach a Bear to Fish
episodes.overview: Jeff's first lesson for Bob and Screech is teaching them how to fish, but it's more difficult than he imagined, and Bob appears to be falling behind Screech.

episodes.name: What About Bob?
episodes.overview: Bob's injured foot is a concern as Jeff teaches the bears to forage for food. Later, Jeff shrugs off a slash to the arm, and faces the prospect of a future without Bob and Screech.

episodes.name: Bears on the Run
episodes.overview: Jeffâ€™s unconventional hunting lessons fail to prepare Bob and Screech to hunt game in the wild, but he discovers they may be learning on their own. Meanwhile he reminisces about Grizzly Adams and agonizes over eventually parting ways with his bears.

episodes.name: Teenage Bears
episodes.overview: Jeff makes progress teaching Bob and Screech how to feed themselves, but now has to prepare them for winter hibernation.

episodes.name: Letting Go
episodes.overview: Jeff's last, painful lesson for the bears is teaching them how to be afraid of humans, but he still wonders if they'll be able to survive in the in wild without him.
